ISSUE.TITLE: clicking outside the templates add button should close the menu
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Bug Report ##### SUMMARY On the templates view, clicking on the `+` button opens a menu for choosing the type of template to add (workflow or job template). Once opened, clicking outside of this menu should close it.
